item.description:
Okay everyone, here are the details for wine night!

Every couple should bring one bottle of wine ($20 and under) and an appetizer or dessert. I don't think any of us want to drink wine on an empty stomach.

We will be doing a blind tasting, so we will disguise your bottle and only label the type of wine it is (merlot or zinfandel). This way if some people only like whites, they can stick with those.

Once everyone has had a chance to taste what they wanted, we can pick a winner.

One quick note. We do have a dog (chihuahua) named Bandit. He is very friendly. I just want to make sure that everyone is aware in case anyone has any allergies.
item.name: Wine Night
